paper_abstract: Recently some G(1) Hermite-type interpolation methods using a rational parametric cubic were proposed; the methods reproduce a circular arc when the input data come from it. A G(2) Hermite-type interpolation method is now proposed which reproduces a circular arc when the input data come from it. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: G(2) Hermite interpolation with circular precision
